class.name: PackedInt32Array
class.description: An [Array] specifically designed to hold 32-bit integer values. Packs data tightly, so it saves memory for large array sizes. [b]Note:[/b] This type stores signed 32-bit integers, which means it can take values in the interval [code][-2^31, 2^31 - 1][/code], i.e. [code][-2147483648, 2147483647][/code]. Exceeding those bounds will wrap around. In comparison, [int] uses signed 64-bit integers which can hold much larger values. If you need to pack 64-bit integers tightly, see [PackedInt64Array].

method.name: PackedInt32Array
method.description: Constructs a [PackedInt32Array] as a copy of the given [PackedInt32Array].

method.name: PackedInt32Array
method.description: Constructs a new [PackedInt32Array]. Optionally, you can pass in a generic [Array] that will be converted.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends an element at the end of the array (alias of [method push_back]).

method.name: append_array
method.description: Appends a [PackedInt32Array] at the end of this array.

method.name: duplicate
method.description: Creates a copy of the array, and returns it.

method.name: fill
method.description: Assigns the given value to all elements in the array. This can typically be used together with [method resize] to create an array with a given size and initialized elements.

method.name: insert
method.description: Inserts a new integer at a given position in the array. The position must be valid, or at the end of the array ([code]idx == size()[/code]).

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the array is empty.

method.name: push_back
method.description: Appends a value to the array.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes an element from the array by index.

method.name: resize
method.description: Sets the size of the array. If the array is grown, reserves elements at the end of the array. If the array is shrunk, truncates the array to the new size.

method.name: reverse
method.description: Reverses the order of the elements in the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Changes the integer at the given index.

method.name: sort
method.description: Sorts the elements of the array in ascending order.
